titleStmt.title: The pandectes of the law of nations contayning seuerall discourses of the questions, points, and matters of law, wherein the nations of the world doe consent and accord. Giuing great light to the vnderstanding and opening of the principall obiects, questions, rules, and cases of the ciuill law, and common lawe of this realme of England. Compiled by William Fulbecke.
titleStmt.author: Fulbeck, William, 1560-1603?

publicationStmt.publisher: Imprinted by [Adam Islip for] Thomas Wight,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in the University of Chicago. Library.
